Reviews.Content: Cute and comfortable! Centrally located right off Piazza Santa Maria Novella, Ottaviani has affordable rooms and extra-friendly English-speaking staff. The rooms are kitchy yet comfortable. Easy walking-distance to the train station and all major sights.
Reviews.Author: CiaoBionda
